title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Japan_Cartoonists_Association_Award
transformers_text: The Japan Cartoonists Association Award Nihon Mangaka Ky kai Sh is an annual award for manga sponsored by the Japan Cartoonists Association The prize was first awarded in 1972 Recipients of the Grand Prize receive a gold plaque a medal and a cash prize of 500 000 Recipients of the Excellence Prize receive a silver plaque a medal and a cash prize of 200 000 Recipients of the Special Award receive the same items as the winner s of the Grand Prize 1 Manga no O bento Hak o Shinji Naga shima S enzo wo Ta zune te Okuma n nen Akio It A no Musume wa dare Ka zuko Makino His ho no
